divs: sighting detailsthis was an incident that happened about 10 years ago or so. my brother and i were camping up in the adirondacks in upstate new york, don't remember the exact location now but it was probably near the indian lake \ pharoah lake areas. it was around 11pm. we had eaten dinner and were standing around the campfire. we were camped on a penninsula on the lake. it was a clear, calm night. we then noticed a light coming over the tree tops in the distance probably a mile or so away. we continued to watch it because we did not know what it was a plane, star, etc.. however, as we watched the light it came lower and closer to us until eventually it was just over the treeline and had reached the edge of the lake. it was simply a small white light approximately the size of a basketball or so i would judge. silent. when it reached the edge of the water it just stopped and to my eyes "blinked" away and it was gone. my brother claims it shot up at an angle in a flash into the sky. i did not see that, just that it blinked away. that was the end of the incident.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Adirondacks
This sighting has never been favorited.
